en.title: Products
en.subtitle: Innovative solutions and applications I've developed across various domains

products.name: Terminal Management System
products.description: Management system for payment terminal devices used for money transfer operations and financial transactions.

products.name: SIG
products.description: Comprehensive business solution platform providing integrated services and digital transformation tools.

products.name: Hija Tracking
products.description: IoT device tracking platform for monitoring Jamaah pilgrims in Saudi Arabia with real-time location services.

products.name: AksesBayar
products.description: Fintech merchant aggregator platform with open API for payment gateway integration and financial services.

products.name: Ngisi PPOB
products.description: Payment Point Online Bank (PPOB) platform for handling various bill payments and digital transactions.

products.name: RPay-KU
products.description: Merchant aggregator fintech platform similar to Akses Bayar, providing comprehensive payment solutions.

products.name: Vinilon IoT
products.description: IoT-enabled platform for smart device management and monitoring with real-time data analytics.
